title: Time vortex
text: Normal damage and target vanishes, reappearing 1d4 rounds later.

title: Maximum effect
text: Maximize all spell variables.

title: Draining spell
text: Double damage and target randomly loses one spell or one use of a spell-like ability.

title: Wild surge
text: Normal damage and normal damage of a random energy type.

title: Excruciating
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Terrifying display
text: Normal damage and target %STATUS-FRIGHTENED=frightened% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%).

title: Dispelling aura
text: Normal damage and dispel magic on the target.

title: Concussive spell
text: Double damage and 1d4 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away.

title: I love you, man
text: Normal damage and target is Charmed for 3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%).

title: Electrocuted
text: Double damage. If the spell does electricity damage, target %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Hypnotic link
text: Double damage and you may give the target 1 Suggestion (as the spell. %SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%).

title: Frozen
text: Double damage. If the spell does cold damage, target takes 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Side effect
text: Double damage and you become %STATUS-INVISIBLE=invisible% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Turned around
text: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round.

title: Stunned
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.

title: Call of the wind
text: Double damage or triple damage to animals, fey, magical beasts and vermin.

title: Petrified
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-PETRIFIED=petrified% for 1d4 hours (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).

title: Pretty colors
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DAZZLED=dazzled% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Nerve damage
text: Normal damage and target is affected by the Slow spell for 1d6 rounds.

title: Arcane blast
text: Double damage and 2d6 random energy damage (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Reflex halves%).

title: Planar rift
text: Normal damage and target sent to a random plane (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%).

title: Eyeburn
text: Normal damage and target %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).

title: Intense strike
text: Double damage and ignore energy resistance (but not immunity).

title: Transposition
text: Double damage and you and target switch places.

title: Light blast
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.

title: Conduit
text: Double damage and target takes a -4 penalty on saves vs. your spells for 1d6 rounds.

title: Lingering magic
text: Normal damage this round and half damage each round for 1d4 rounds.

title: Allergic reaction
text: Double damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% to a random ability score.

title: Arcane glow
text: Double damage and target glows like Faerie fire for 1d6 rounds.

title: Combustion
text: Double damage. If fire spell, target catches fire, taking 2d6 fire damage per round until extinguished.

title: Unnatural selection
text: Double damage or triple damage to aberrations and outsiders.

title: Corrosive
text: Double damage. If acid spell, target takes 2d6 acid damage for 1d4 rounds.

title: Funny bone
text: Double damage and target spends 1 round laughing (as Hideous laughter spell, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%).

title: Phased
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCORPOREAL=incorporeal% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%).

title: Life leech
text: Normal damage and 1 %STATUS-NEGATIVE-LEVEL=negative level% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates% after 1 day).

title: Siren song
text: Double damage or triple damage to giants, humanoids and monstrous humanoids.

title: Distraction
text: Double damage and an illusion appears to attack foe, flanking him for you for 1d6 rounds.

title: Arcane goo
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-ENTANGLED=entangled% (DC 20 Str or Escape Artist to be freed).

title: Hoarder's wrath
text: Double damage or triple damage to dragons.

title: Mind cloud
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1 round.

title: Elemental call
text: Normal damage. If the spell does elemental damage, a Medium elemental appears to serve for 1d4 rounds.

title: Splash spell
text: Normal damage and half damage to all adjacent targets.

title: Olfactory overload
text: Double damage and target loses scent and blindsense for 1 day.

title: Cut off from magic
text: Normal damage and target cannot cast spells or use spell-like abilities for 1d4 rounds.

title: Aura of protection
text: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round.

title: Vulnerability
text: Double damage and if the spell did elemental damage the target is now vulnerable to that element for 3 rounds.

title: Roaring spell
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Returning spell
text: Double damage and spell is not lost.

title: Power surge
text: Triple damage.

title: Vampiric magic
text: Normal damage. You are healed the same amount.

title: Shrink ray
text: Normal damage and target is reduced for 3 rounds (as Reduce person, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%).
